title: 80/682/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 June 1980 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 25 June 1980  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Directive 72/159/EEC  (Only the Dutch text is authentic)  (80/682/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The existing provisions implementing Directive 72/159/EEC in the Netherlands continue, having regard to decision No 225 of 26 February 1980 of the "Stichting Ontwikkelings- en Saneringsfonds voor de Landbouw" to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 June 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 302, 4.11.1976, p. 19.
